channel.title: Poison Damage
channel.description: How do i add poison damage to a weapon?

item.title: Poison Damage
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

you need these

public int PoisonDelay = 999999;
public int PoisonClear = 0;
public int Poison = (int, int, int) {
int1 = PoisonDelay;
int2 = Damage; (you may have another method and could replace)
int3 = PoisonClear;
}
then you should use those variables by ading them onto a weapon say item 1 = a dragon scimmy (EXAMPLE ONLY)

ItemID = 1 //dragon scimmy
PoisonDelay = 4
(example only, dif scource have diferent poison methods) Poison =
PoisonClear = 30. you may already have one and i think the crappy one i made will fail)

idk but that should be like poison starts after 4 seconds for what ever your poison method is and clears after 30
you will need to edit this to make it work.

Read full topic
